CSGO is a fantastic game. It's a classic. There's not really anything I dislike other then the slow loading times.

game is nice but Valve has destroyed it. People leave matchmaking whenever they feel like it because they're not getting any serious punishment for that. Ranking system is just bad and not shared with other csgo members. It doesn't feel like trust factor plays any significant role when its time to put teams together. if you don't have a full team to play every day with your chances of getting anywhere near to the top ranks are small. you could win 10 games in a row and lose 4 and get de - ranked. I still play game everyday. probably because of my competitive personality and money that I've put into game. Prime status is absolute joke. Game should never been put out free to play. I feel sorry for anyone playing this game including myself. at least until Valve does something about this.
If u wanna scream at ur monitor at the middle of the night this game is right for u
